txt.en:
'I do not need to know who you are. All I know is that you are not holding a rod, and so you are like us: a worker or a mercenary.

'If you are looking to earn a little favour from the workers and people here, we can allow you join our little game.

'The premise is gruesome, but the payout can be good.

'A good day is a day without injury or worse here in Rakhatâb. A bad day, on the other hand, I am sure you can imagine.

'All you need do is tell me what foreman will have tragedy befall their workers. If you choose correctly, you earn a share of the bets. If you lose, it is only a bit of coin. What say you?'
A worker in the fortress asked if you were interested in betting on the odds of a terrible event befalling a worker under the watchful eyes of one of the foretress' foremen.
'If you would like to play, all you need to do next is tell me which foreman you think will have a worker experience an accident.'

You were asked if you wanted to participate in a macabre game that the workers of Rakhatâb are playing. You will need to pay the entry fee and then make a choice: Which foreman do you think will have an accident befall a worker under their care?
